items.title: ‘It’s an expensive piece of equipment’: My neighbor asked to borrow my snowblower. Do I say yes?
items.description: “The projected snowfall this weekend doesn’t look to be changing too much.”

items.title: ‘I need protein shakes’: Couples disagree about panic-buying for this weekend’s snowstorm
items.description: There’s one thing worse than hunkering down during a snowstorm — and that’s doing so with someone who resents your spending.

items.title: ‘I‘m facing an ethical dilemma’: My widowed mother is cutting my step siblings out of the family trust. Do I have a responsibility?
items.description: “My mother has now hired an attorney to revise the trust and remove her late husband’s children as beneficiaries.”

items.title: Natural-gas futures are surging again, after last week’s historic climb
items.description: Natural-gas prices were off to another blistering start on Monday as a bitter winter storm has left thousands without power.

items.title: Why many large-bank stocks look like bargains for long-term investors
items.description: A combination of high and improving returns on equity and low or declining price/earnings ratios make the case for several major industry players.
